attributes.action: ensure the long term future of The RED ARROWS!!!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Future of Red Arrows under review 
Press Association - Sunday January 21, 2007 4:53 PM 

The future of the RAF's Red Arrows display team is being considered as part of a review of military spending, the Ministry of Defence confirmed.

Axing the squadron would mean the loss of a great "ambassador" for the UK abroad. The value of that far exceeds their funding. It is inconceivable that they should be axed!

They provide awe inspiring displays at numerous airshows and I along with millions of others LOVE THEM.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
